title: Payments Experience Best Practices
summary: This page discusses the critical connection between the payments experience and customer satisfaction in the subscription business model. It highlights how a positive payments experience can reduce churn and improve retention, offering best practices for CX and Retention leaders to optimize their approach.
key_points: The direct link between retention, revenue, and profits in subscription models.
The importance of the payments experience in customer satisfaction and churn reduction.
Organizational alignment between Finance, CX/Retention, and Operations for retention.
Reducing customer churn caused by failed payments.
